CustomField.description: Needed to show the name of the customer in data tables in Flows.
CustomField.formula:
IF(
Account.IsPersonAccount,
IF(ISBLANK(Account.FirstName),"",Account.FirstName) & IF(ISBLANK(Account.MiddleName),"", " " & Account.MiddleName) & IF(ISBLANK(Account.LastName),"", " " & Account.LastName),
Account.Name )
CustomField.label: Full Account Name
